original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, posts as p WHERE pl.PostId = p.Id AND c.PostId = p.Id AND v.PostId = p.Id AND ph.PostId = p.Id AND pl.LinkTypeId=1 AND pl.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-10-19 15:02:42' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-06-18 17:14:07' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-20 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE postLinks.LinkTypeId = 1 AND postLinks.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-10-19 15:02:42'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E5E2 AS SELECT * FROM E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E5.Id=E2.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-06-18 17:14:07'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E5E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E5E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E5E2.Id=E3.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-20 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E5E2E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E5E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E5E2E3.Id=E4.PostId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E2E3E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5E2E3E4 WHERE E1.PostId=E5E2E3E4.Id)
